DataElement.preferredDefinition: The words to identity a person acting as the channel for communication with regards to patient related documents exchanged for particular goods or services.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Voucher Contact Person Person Name
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A document that can be exchanged for particular goods or services or one serving as a record of money paid._A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group._A word or group of words indicating the identity of a person usually consisting of a first (personal) name and a last (family) name with an optional middle name. In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:A document that can be exchanged for particular goods or services or one serving as a record of money paid.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A document that can be exchanged for particular goods or services or one serving as a record of money paid.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.:A word or group of words indicating the identity of a person usually consisting of a first (personal) name and a last (family) name with an optional middle name. In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.

Concepts.definition: A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.

A word or group of words indicating the identity of a person usually consisting of a first (personal) name and a last (family) name with an optional middle name. In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.
